de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple

Class DefaultTncsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple.DefaultTncsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TnccsHandler, TnccsMessageHandler, TncsHandler

    public class DefaultTncsHandler
extends Object
implements TncsHandler
    Generic handler to handle messages destined to/from a TNCS.

      DefaultTncsHandler(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed sessionAttributes)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dumpMessage(TnccsMessage message)
      Forwards the messages to the handler but does not allow the handler to send messages in return.

      Returns the preferred language for human readable message content.

      Handles a message containing the preferred language for human readable strings of a peer.

      Maps a action recommendation to a connection state reflecting the action.

      Requests messages containing an overall recommendation based on the recommendations from the available IMV.

      Requests a list of messages the handler wants to send.

      Notifies the handler that the state of the related connection has changed.
